data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Slavic countries are noted for having masculine and feminine versions for many (but not all) of their names. In ____ countries ____ use ____ a ____ form ____ obligatory ____ official ____ as ____ as ____ other ____, ____ for ____. In some countries only the male form figures in official use (Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Montenegro, Serbia, Slovenia), but in communication (speech, print) a feminine form is often used.
data.partBlankContent: Slavic countries are noted for having masculine and feminine versions for many (but not all) of their names. In mo__ countries t__ use o_ a femi____ form i_ obligatory i_ official docu_____ as we__ as i_ other commun_______, exc___ for forei_____. In some countries only the male form figures in official use (Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Montenegro, Serbia, Slovenia), but in communication (speech, print) a feminine form is often used.
data.answer: 斯拉夫国家以许多(但不是所有)名字的阳性和阴性版本而闻名。在大多数国家，除外国人外，在官方文件和其他交流中都必须使用女性形式。在一些国家(波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那、克罗地亚、黑山、塞尔维亚、斯洛文尼亚)，官方只使用男性形象，但在交流(演讲、印刷)中经常使用女性形象。
